name: 001 sarandib
description: the first of twelve images - something that appeared by chance that was delightful, a series that of such that developed into something else. sarandib is the name for sri lanka in medieval arabic, and the source of the word serendipity. all of these works, twelve in total, were serendipitous - and yet! - the fruit of many previous years. i love them, i hope you do as well.
